title: Bloomberg Markets: Zafran Says Everyone's Winner in the Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zafran Says Everyone's Winner in the Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alan Zafran Senior Managing Director and Wealth Manager First Republic Investment Management Discussing the markets heating up and why diversity is the way to invest.
